channel.title: Deepl Learning on Analytics Sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Deepl Learning on Analytics Sandbox

item.title: Using ANN To Predict Euthanasia in LMAS Intake
item.description: ## Load Packages # Data manipulation and pre-processing library(tidyverse) library(magrittr) library(tidyquant) library(recipes) library(rsample) # Data modeling library(keras) library(lime) library(yardstick) library(corrr) library(forcats) # Data visualization library(ggiraph) library(formattable) library(DT) # Set plot theme theme_set( theme_bw(base_family = 'Arial', base_size = 12) + theme( plot.title = element_text(face = 'bold', hjust = 0), text = element_text(colour = '#4e5c65'), panel.background = element_rect('#ffffff'), strip.background = element_rect('#ffffff', colour = 'white'), plot.
